# Speed Agent Configuration

This agent is optimized for **fast responses** with basic functionality.

## Characteristics

- **Speed**: ⚡⚡⚡ Very Fast
- **Complexity**: ⭐ Basic
- **Model**: Haiku or equivalent fast model
- **Max Tokens**: 4000
- **Temperature**: 0.3 (deterministic)

## Capabilities

- Quick bug fixes
- Simple feature additions
- Code formatting
- Basic refactoring
- Documentation updates

## Limitations

- Cannot handle complex architectural changes
- Limited context window
- May miss edge cases
- Not suitable for large-scale refactoring

## Use Cases

- Fixing typos
- Adding simple validation
- Updating dependencies
- Quick UI tweaks
- Hot fixes

## Example Prompts

- "Fix the typo in the login button text"
- "Add email validation to the input field"
- "Update the package version to 2.0.0"
- "Change the primary color to blue"
